  type="text/css"
  href="/sites/CGFS/Style Library/apps/audit/src/audit_page_reports.css"
/>
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  type="text/css"
  href="/sites/CGFS/Style Library/apps/audit/src/audit_styles_hide_ribbon.css"
/>
<div class="audit">
  <div class="container">
    <h1>​​Bureau of the Comptroller and Global Financial Services</h1>
    <hr />
    <p>
      Welcome to the Bureau of the Comptroller and Global Financial Services
      (CGFS) Audit Tracking Tool SharePoint site. This site is dedicated to
      requesting and monitoring the audit requests from the independent auditors
      conducting the audit of the Department’s financial statements.
    </p>
    <p>
      This audit tracking tool allows us to generate group emails to multiple
      action offices simultaneously. We are able to remind action offices
      automatically of items needed and to request follow up items when the
      requests do not meet the needs of the auditors.
    </p>
    <p>
      If you have any questions or issues with this Audit Tracking Tool, please
      send an email to
      <a href="mailto:CGFSauditrequests@state.gov"
        >CGFSauditrequests@state.gov</a
      >.
    </p>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
  /* .audit {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  .container {
    max-width: 800px;
  } */
  #contentRow {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }
  #DeltaPlaceHolderMain {
    padding: 2rem 4rem;
    max-width: 1200px;
  }
  .audit h1 {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: var(--text-primary);
  }

  .audit p {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }
</style>
